item.title: About
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row background_img_id="EPICO_DEMO_IMAGE_ID"][vc_column width="5/6"][vc_empty_space height="200px"][vc_column_text text_animation="fade-in-bottom" text_animation_delay="300"]Hello! [/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height="15px"][vc_column_text text_animation="fade-in" text_animation_delay="450"]
I’m Diego Aguilar a multi-disciplinary designer based in London. I specialise in creating brands and building digital experiences.
[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height="20px"][vc_single_image image="EPICO_DEMO_IMAGE_ID" img_size="medium"][vc_empty_space height="65px"][vc_column_text text_animation="fade-in-bottom" text_animation_delay="250"]Education Studio Art Centers, Italy 2008 Royal College of Art, London 2011[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height="100px"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/6"][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: [vc_row background_color="#111111" row_animation_delay="180" row_padding_bottom="200"][vc_column width="1/4"][vc_empty_space height="15"][textbox title="Awards" title_color="#ffffff" text_animation="fade-in" text_animation_delay="200"][/vc_column][vc_column width="3/4"][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/4"][vc_column_text text_animation="fade-in" text_animation_delay="250"]2017[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="3/4"][vc_column_text text_animation="fade-in" text_animation_delay="300"] Gulkistan Residency, Laugarvatn, Iceland Arteles Residency, Haukijärvi, Finland [/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_separator color="rgba(255,255,255,0.07)"][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/4"][vc_column_text text_animation="fade-in" text_animation_delay="350"]2016[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="3/4"][vc_column_text text_animation="fade-in" text_animation_delay="400"]Vermont Studio Center Residency; Johnson, VT David Best Apprenticeship and group collaboration Project; Anderson Ranch Arts Center Residency Workshop; Aspen, CO[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row background_color="#111111" row_padding_bottom="100"][vc_column width="1/4"][vc_empty_space height="15"][textbox title="Experience" title_color="#ffffff" text_animation="fade-in" text_animation_delay="200"][/vc_column][vc_column width="3/4"][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/4"][vc_column_text text_animation="fade-in" text_animation_delay="250"]dec 2015 - today[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="3/4"][vc_column_text text_animation="fade-in" text_animation_delay="300"]Creative Director at Oglivy Mather [/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_separator color="rgba(255,255,255,0.07)"][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/4"][vc_column_text text_animation="fade-in" text_animation_delay="400"]jan 2013 - apr 2014[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="3/4"][vc_column_text text_animation="fade-in" text_animation_delay="450"]Senior Designer at Publicis Modem[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_separator color="rgba(255,255,255,0.07)"][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/4"][vc_column_text text_animation="fade-in" text_animation_delay="350"]nov 2012 - jan 2013[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="3/4"][vc_column_text text_animation="fade-in" text_animation_delay="450"]Backend Developer at Fantasy Interactive[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Contact
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[text* your-name ] Name Name

[email* your-email ] Email Email

[text your-subject] Subject Subject

[textarea* your-message x10] Message Message

[submit "Submit"]
